website_summaries.verdict: Kids can take their Littlest Pet Shop toys on all sorts of cruise ship fun with this quality playset.
pros: Includes 8 accessories, a sticker sheet, and 3 pets (one Classic, one Mini, and one Teensie)
Has room for up to 30 pets of different sizes
Features a rock climbing wall, surfing area, dance floor, and zip lining
Opens and closes to save space when not being used
cons: Comes in a brown box, not the original packaging, which isn't ideal for gift giving

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested
customer_reviews.text: The true test of a toy is are they still playing with it days after receiving it? The answer to this one for us is yes. Its been weeks honestly because her birthday at the beginning of the month. Good sized. played with a lot, easy to fold up and move and survived the bathtub last night. Thumbs up. Kid approved.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hardy Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to see the letters on the boat to know where the stickers go. FYI feel for them or watch my video
customer_reviews.author: Tam Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This came new and with all the parts. My only complaint is with the brand LPS. The setting were the animals sit changes shape between series so you can not keep an animal in a sitting postion well especially for moving parts. So the playset comes with 3 animals and you cant use other series animals well. Thanks LPS. $$$$
customer_reviews.author: denys Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy!
customer_reviews.text: We love LPS and toys like this which have a lot of potentials to play within the long run. I wish they keep making newer sets like this for the LPS as they still become favorite toys for the modern kids as they were years ago. but it looks like they don`t sell anything LPS in the stores anymore...And they don`t sell on their website but link to the stores where to buy. I don`t see any good LPS in Target or Walmart anymore. Hope at list they keep selling on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Comes in plain brown box, but product inside was in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: The ship inside the packaging was in perfect condition, the only thing I wasn't crazy about was the packaging itself. Instead of coming in normal LPS package, it was in a brown box, and so when my daughter opened it, she had no idea what it was and I almost chunked it to the side for later. I think she would've been more excited if it had come in original packaging. However, it is well made, and just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and have been disappointed with all of the new sassy cheap sets
customer_reviews.text: We are big pet shop fans, and have been disappointed with all of the new sassy cheap sets. This cruise ship is like the old classics. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jana D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy you should get it for your kid
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes these lps and one day she was on my phone and saw this lps cruise ship and started begging me to buy it for her And then one day I finally said yes and bought it and she loves it she plays with it almost every day she has two sets one LPS café and then this one and she just plays with it all the time I really recommend buying it for your kid specially if she/he likes lps
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Russell

customer_reviews.title: The product was perfect, but the packaging was terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product was perfect, but the packaging was terrible. I got this as a Christmas gift but it was built into the brown shipping box. It's not as exciting for a 7 year old to open a brown box instead of the product box to be excited about on christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jezzeria

product_meta.title: Littlest Pet Shop Cruise Ship
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIt’s time for sea-farin’ adventures on the LPS Cruise Ship! Kids can imagine this turtle captain’s at the helm with two eager passengers (a cat and an octopus). This vessel is ready to take even more fun-lovin’ pets on the vacation of a lifetime. Whether the goal is adventure or relaxation, there’s plenty to do aboard this spacious cruise ship. Kids can pretend that pets are tearin’ up the dance floor, scaling the rock-climbing wall, surfing or even ziplining! Other pets might be chillin’ out on deck or in their cabin – imagine them taking a nap, enjoying snacks, or even taking a selfie or two! Up to 30 pets of various sizes (each sold separately) can fit into this awesome playset, which opens and closes for maximum play space. It’s definitely a ship-shape way to give pets the best vacation ever! Littlest Pet Shop and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Cruise ship is packed with fun activities for pets
Playset opens and closes for maximum play space
Includes unassembled playset; 1 Classic-, 1 Mini-, and 1 Teensie-scale pet; 8 accessories; sticker sheet; and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars589 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
